about_the_game:
Customize Everything

Take full control of your OverKnight’s potential. Swap out every part and personalize every card in your deck using Components. With endless combinations, you can craft truly unique strategies that reflect your style. The possibilities are endless!

Unleash your OVK full power: Equip your Overknight with five parts, and mix and match between different sets to create the perfect OverKnight for you. Every part will bring different things to the table - from skills and passives to allowing you to use specialized cards for your strategy.

Customize your own cards: Every card can have up to 2 components that range from modifiers, extra-effects, costs, and conditions - Make sure every single card in your card fits your unique.

Battle Your Way Through the Libra Tower

As you win Anima Duels and progress through the ranks, you’ll climb the legendary Libra Tower with new challenges and technology to discover on each floor. Only the most skilled and strategic pilots can rise to the top. Will you be among them?

Claim Victory, Earn Your Reward

With every victory, you’ll collect exclusive booster packs and unlock distinct parts and customizable cards. Build the ultimate OverKnight, amass a rare collection, trade with your friends, or dominate the Player-Driven Marketplace. Every reward you claim brings you one step closer to your legacy in the OverNet!

At The turn of the Information Age, humanity was devastated by pollution, endless wars, and human greed. A collective of scientists from all fields, from the social sciences to the hard sciences, came together to devise a holistic, universal solution to all human problems.

Many solar cycles have passed, and humanity and society have now been transformed for the better. At the center of this transformation is Cybermask, an enigmatic yet benevolent sage who shared the knowledge that powered human society through a revolutionary network known as the OverNet. This heralded the birth of the Wisdom Age for humanity.

Unlike its predecessor, the internet, the OverNet is the physical manifestation of the digital realm, allowing seamless transportation of not only data but also physical matter. This advancement is possible due to Quantum Bits, or Q-Bits, a new compound particle harnessed by Cybermask that stores and transmits energy, matter, and information in a single unit.

Multi-Interface Neural Devices, better known as MINDs, were introduced to enable humans to manipulate Q-Bits over the OverNet, making life convenient, productive, and peaceful. This innovation allowed people to control tools, vehicles, and devices directly through their MINDs, creating endless beneficial applications.

Cybermask’s source of knowledge is a mysterious artifact called the Hypercube, offered to anyone capable of climbing the Libra Tower and meeting him at the top. To ascend the Tower, challengers must face off in Anima Duels piloting OverKnights. These powerful robots, made entirely of Q-Bits, are shaped by their pilot’s determination, will, and ingenuity, responding to Command Cards to unlock their full potential.

OverKnight pilots from all walks of life gather at the entrance of the Libra Tower, each with different aspirations and motivations to obtain the Hypercube and fulfill their deepest desires.

What will you achieve using the knowledge of the Hypercube?

short_description: Step into the heart of PvP Arena battles where every victory counts in this f2p Card Battler. Test your skills and prove you’re worthy of reaching the top as you customize your OverKnight with powerful Parts and Cards. With each battle, you’ll get closer to becoming the next legendary OverKnight pilot!
